16 template<class Tx, class Tad>
17 IOManager<Tx, Tad>::IOManager(std::shared_ptr<Mesh<Tx, Tad>> val_mesh, std::shared_ptr<Config<Tx>> val_config){
18  config = val_config;
19  mesh = val_mesh;
20 
21  // required for npz
22  const auto nic = mesh->nic;
23  const auto njc = mesh->njc;
24  const auto nq = mesh->solution->nq;
25  const auto ntrans = mesh->solution->ntrans;
26 
27  if(mesh->label == ""){
28  label = config->io->label;
29  }
30  else{
31  label = config->io->label + "_" + mesh->label;
32  }
33 };

40 template<class Tx, class Tad>
41 void IOManager<Tx, Tad>::write(const size_t iteration){
42  mesh->fluid_model->primvars(mesh->solution->q.const_ref(), mesh->solution->rho, mesh->solution->u, mesh->solution->v, mesh->solution->p, mesh->solution->T);
43  write_tecplot();
44  write_npz();
45  write_restart();
46  write_surface();
47 }

49 template<class Tx, class Tad>
50 void IOManager<Tx, Tad>::write_tecplot(){
51  std::string filename = label + ".tec";
52  const auto nic = mesh->nic;
53  const auto njc = mesh->njc;
54  auto q = mesh->solution->q;
55  auto xc = mesh->xc;
56  auto yc = mesh->yc;
57 
58  const auto nq = mesh->solution->nq;
59  const auto ntrans = mesh->solution->ntrans;
60 
61  std::ofstream outfile;
62  outfile.open(filename);
63  char buffer [500];
64  outfile<<"title = \"Solution\""<<"\n";
65  outfile<<"variables = \"x\" \"y\"";
66  for(size_t tn=0; tn<nq; tn++){
67  outfile << " \""<<mesh->solution->q_name[tn]<<"\"";
68  }
69  for(size_t tn=0; tn<ntrans; tn++){
70  outfile << " \"psi_0\"";
71  }
72  for(size_t tn=0; tn<mesh->solution->naux; tn++){
73  outfile << " \""<<mesh->solution->q_aux_name[tn]<<"\"";
74  }
75 
76  outfile << "\n";
77 
78  outfile<<"zone i="<<nic<<", j="<<njc<<", f=point\n";
79 
80  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
81  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
82  outfile << xc[i][j] << " ";
83  outfile << yc[i][j] << " ";
84 
85  for(size_t k=0; k<nq; k++){
86  outfile << q[i][j][k] << " ";
87  }
88 
89  for(size_t tn=0; tn<ntrans; tn++){
90  outfile << q[i][j][4+tn] << " ";
91  }
92 
93  for(size_t tn=0; tn<mesh->solution->naux; tn++){
94  outfile << mesh->solution->q_aux[i][j][tn] << " ";
95  }
96 
97  outfile << "\n";
98  }
99  }
100 
101  outfile.close();
102  spdlog::get("console")->info("Wrote tecplot file {}.", filename);
103 }

105 template<class Tx, class Tad>
106 void IOManager<Tx, Tad>::write_npz(){
107  std::string filename = label + ".npz";
108  const auto nic = mesh->nic;
109  const auto njc = mesh->njc;
110  auto q = mesh->solution->q;
111  auto xc = mesh->xc;
112  auto yc = mesh->yc;
113  const unsigned int shape[] = {nic, njc};
114  const unsigned int shapeq[] = {nic, njc, 4};
115  auto rho = mesh->solution->rho;
116  auto u = mesh->solution->u;
117  auto v = mesh->solution->v;
118  auto p = mesh->solution->p;
119  auto T = mesh->solution->T;
120 
121  cnpy::npz_save(filename,"xc",xc.data(),shape,2,"w");
122  cnpy::npz_save(filename,"yc",yc.data(),shape,2,"a");
123  cnpy::npz_save(filename,"q",q.data(),shapeq,3,"a");
124  cnpy::npz_save(filename,"rho",rho.data(),shape,2,"a");
125  cnpy::npz_save(filename,"u",u.data(),shape,2,"a");
126  cnpy::npz_save(filename,"v",v.data(),shape,2,"a");
127  cnpy::npz_save(filename,"p",p.data(),shape,2,"a");
128  cnpy::npz_save(filename,"T",T.data(),shape,2,"a");
129 
130  spdlog::get("console")->info("Wrote numpy npz file {}.", filename);
131 }

134 template<class Tx, class Tad>
135 void IOManager<Tx, Tad>::write_restart(){
136  std::string filename = label + ".out";
137  const auto nic = mesh->nic;
138  const auto njc = mesh->njc;
139  const auto nq = mesh->solution->nq;
140  const auto ntrans = mesh->solution->ntrans;
141  auto q = mesh->solution->q;
142  auto xc = mesh->xc;
143  auto yc = mesh->yc;
144  std::ofstream outfile(filename,std::ofstream::binary);
145  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
146  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
147  outfile.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&q[i][j][0]), sizeof(Tx)*(nq+ntrans));
148  }
149  }
150  outfile.close();
151  spdlog::get("console")->info("Wrote restart file {}.", filename);
152 }
153 
154 template<class Tx, class Tad>
155 void IOManager<Tx, Tad>::read_restart(){
156  std::string filename = label + ".out";
157  const auto nic = mesh->nic;
158  const auto njc = mesh->njc;
159  const auto nq = mesh->solution->nq;
160  const auto ntrans = mesh->solution->ntrans;
161 
162  auto q = mesh->solution->q;
163  auto xc = mesh->xc;
164  auto yc = mesh->yc;
165  std::ifstream infile(filename,std::ofstream::binary);
166 
167  infile.seekg (0,infile.end);
168  long size = infile.tellg();
169  long size_expected = nic*njc*(nq+ntrans)*sizeof(Tx);
170  infile.seekg (0);
171  assert(size == size_expected);
172 
173  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
174  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
175  infile.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&q[i][j][0]), sizeof(Tx)*(nq+ntrans));
176  }
177  }
178  infile.close();
179 
180 }
181 template<class Tx, class Tad>
182 void IOManager<Tx, Tad>::write_surface(){
183  std::string filename = label + ".surface";
184  const auto nic = mesh->nic;
185  const auto njc = mesh->njc;
186  const auto nq = mesh->solution->nq;
187  auto q = mesh->solution->q;
188  auto xc = mesh->xc;
189  auto yc = mesh->yc;
190  auto x = mesh->xv;
191  auto y = mesh->yv;
192 
193  auto p_inf = config->freestream->p_inf;
194  auto rho_inf = config->freestream->rho_inf;
195  auto u_inf = config->freestream->u_inf;
196  auto v_inf = config->freestream->v_inf;
197  auto mu_inf = config->freestream->mu_inf;
198  auto aoa = config->freestream->aoa;
199 
200  size_t j1 = mesh->j1-1;
201  Tx xw, cp;
202  std::ofstream outfile;
203  outfile.open(filename);
204  auto rho = mesh->solution->rho;
205  auto u = mesh->solution->u;
206  auto v = mesh->solution->v;
207  auto p = mesh->solution->p;
208  auto T = mesh->solution->T;
209 
210 
211  auto Fn_pressure = 0.0;
212  auto Fc_pressure = 0.0;
213 
214  auto Fn_viscous = 0.0;
215  auto Fc_viscous = 0.0;
216 
217  auto grad_u = mesh->equation->grad_u_eta;
218  auto grad_v = mesh->equation->grad_v_eta;
219 
220  for(size_t i=j1; i<j1+mesh->nb; i++){
221  xw = xc[i][0];
222  auto qinf = (0.5*rho_inf*(u_inf*u_inf + v_inf*v_inf));
223  cp = (0.5*(p[i][0] + p[i][1]) - p_inf)/qinf;
224  auto tau = mu_inf*(value(grad_u[i][0][1]) - value(grad_v[i][0][0]))/qinf;
225  auto cf = tau;
226  outfile<<xw<<" "<<cp<<" "<<cf<<std::endl;
227  auto dx = (x[i+1][0] - x[i][0]);
228  auto dy = (y[i+1][0] - y[i][0]);
229  Fn_pressure = Fn_pressure - cp*dx;
230  Fc_pressure = Fc_pressure + cp*dy;
231 
232  auto sfdiv = 2.0/3.0*(value(grad_u[i][0][0]) + value(grad_v[i][0][1]));
233  auto sxx = mu_inf*(2.0*value(grad_u[i][0][0]) - sfdiv)/qinf;
234  auto syy = mu_inf*(2.0*value(grad_v[i][0][1]) - sfdiv)/qinf;
235  Fn_viscous = Fn_viscous - tau*dy + syy*dx;
236  Fc_viscous = Fc_viscous + tau*dx - sxx*dy;
237  }
238 
239  auto ca = cos(aoa);
240  auto sa = sin(aoa);
241  auto cl_pressure = -Fc_pressure*sa + Fn_pressure*ca;
242  auto cd_pressure = Fc_pressure*ca + Fn_pressure*sa;
243 
244  auto cl_viscous = -Fc_viscous*sa + Fn_viscous*ca;
245  auto cd_viscous = Fc_viscous*ca + Fn_viscous*sa;
246 
247  auto cl = cl_viscous + cl_pressure;
248  auto cd = cd_viscous + cd_pressure;
249  spdlog::get("console")->info("Pressure Cl: {} Cd: {}", cl_pressure, cd_pressure);
250  spdlog::get("console")->info("Viscous Cl: {} Cd: {}", cl_viscous, cd_viscous);
251  spdlog::get("console")->info("Total Cl: {} Cd: {}", cl, cd);
252 
253  outfile.close();
254  spdlog::get("console")->info("Wrote surface file {}.", filename);
255 }
